name: Operation Community
description:
*Browser Version does not support Save Game function*

Summary

An area resident unsatisfied with the local economy establishes a cooperative relationship with local business owners in order to help with the general region's development.

Play through puzzles which get progressively harder, and try to help shop owners the best you can with your energy.

Credits:

Programmer: Gabriel Pittol

Artist: Jayhson Magnus

Game Designer: Thais Machado
